::Hot Rod/Jhiaxus/Zarak::
   
  Hot Rod was paying attention to see if "Nightlight" was hurt which allowed Hydras to fire his weapon without Hot Rod being prepared. The shot strikes Hot Rod directly on the Autobot symbol on his chest. His motor function fail and he falls to the ground. He tries to scream out for Nightlight but cannot move his vocal projectors.
   
  Jhiaxus is now up and returns from the swamp. He is slightly charred.
   
  Jhiaxus: I kinda wish we had planned to just kill him now.
   
  Zarak has come too but is in pain.
   
  Zarak: He broke my exo-suit...
   
  Getting up.
   
  Zarak: Ouch! I think he broke a rib too.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

Hydras hissed with PAin but still hold the clone, when Hot rod spoke at 
him, Hydras shot a special gun that would paralize him, he would be 
fully conceus, but he couldnt move in a lage while.

OOC: If you let that robo
